doc.field: International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 66 Records
International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 66 Records

Aetna Steel Products Corporation: Organized after 6-year campaign, Aetna serves as a good example of general coverage of company/union relations (1955-1961). Sidney Raphael serves here as company attorney, (see other shops for Raphael as union attorney). The Arnot Marine Division was taken over by Kahr Bearing in 1960-1961; the rest of the company was sold in 1967. (see also 9/49)
